history.proof: intros m c1 c2 H1 H2. unfold weight. qsimpl use: encode_permutation. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros m c1 c2 H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite -> (encode_permutation eqA_dec m c1 c2 H2 H1).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} m : list A c1 : code A c2 : list (A * list bool) H1 : unique_prefix c1 H2 : permutation c1 c2 The term "eqA_dec" has type "forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}" while it is expected to have type "Type".

ctx: intros m c1 c2 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a = b -> False}) (m : list A) (c1 c2 : code A), permutation c1 c2 -> unique_prefix c1 -> encode eqA_dec c1 m = encode eqA_dec c2 m A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a = b -> False} m : list A c1 : code A c2 : list (A * list bool) H2 : permutation c1 c2 H0 : forall (a1 a2 : A) (lb1 lb2 : list bool), In (a1, lb1) c1 -> In (a2, lb2) c1 -> is_prefix lb1 lb2 -> a1 = a2 H3 : unique_key c1 Unable to unify "length (encode eqA_dec c2 m)" with "length (encode eqA_dec c1 m)".

original: intros m c1 c2 H1 H2. unfold weight. rewrite -> (encode_permutation eqA_dec m c1 c2 H2 H1). reflexivity.
